name: CascadeType
desc: Propagation of operations across relationships.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Column
desc: Associates a field with a database column.

name: name
desc: Optional override for the column name. Defaults to snake_case of field name.

name: nullable
desc: Whether the column is nullable.

name: type
desc: Optional override for the database type (e.g., 'TEXT', 'VARCHAR(255)').

name: unique
desc: Whether the column is unique.

name: Convert
desc: Specifies a custom converter for a field.

name: CreatedAt
desc: Indicates that a field should automatically store the creation timestamp.

name: Database
desc: Indicates the database definition the annotated class is associated with.

name: name
desc: The name of the database definition in databases.yaml.

name: DatapodPluginDef
desc: Indicates a class is a Datapod plugin definition.

name: name
desc: The name of the plugin as referred to in databases.yaml.

name: Entity
desc: Associates a class with a database table.

name: tableName
desc: Optional override for the table name. Defaults to snake_case of class name.

name: FetchJoin
desc: Indicates that the specified property should be eagerly fetched using a JOIN.

name: FetchType
desc: Strategy for fetching associated entities.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Id
desc: Indicates the primary key field.

name: autoIncrement
desc: Whether the database should automatically increment this value.

name: Index
desc: Indicates that a field or a combination of fields should be indexed.

name: columns
desc:
List of column names for composite indexes.
Only used when applied to a class.

name: name
desc: Optional name for the index.

name: unique
desc: Whether the index should be unique.

name: JoinColumn
desc: Overrides default foreign key column naming for a relationship.

name: name
desc: The name of the foreign key column.

name: nullable
desc: Whether the foreign key column is nullable.

name: ManyToOne
desc: Defines a many-to-one relationship.

name: cascade
desc: The cascade strategies to apply.

name: fetch
desc: The fetch strategy (eager or lazy).

name: optional
desc: Whether the relationship is optional (nullable).

name: OneToMany
desc: Defines a one-to-many relationship.

name: cascade
desc: The cascade strategies to apply.

name: fetch
desc: The fetch strategy (eager or lazy).

name: mappedBy
desc: The name of the field in the related entity that maps back to this one.

name: OneToOne
desc: Defines a one-to-one relationship.

name: cascade
desc: The cascade strategies to apply.

name: fetch
desc: The fetch strategy (eager or lazy).

name: mappedBy
desc: The name of the field in the related entity that maps back to this one.

name: optional
desc: Whether the relationship is optional (nullable).

name: Query
desc: Indicates a custom SQL query to execute for a repository method.

name: sql
desc: The raw SQL query to execute.

name: Repository
desc: Indicates a repository interface for code generation.

name: Unique
desc: Indicates that a field or a combination of fields must be unique.

name: columns
desc:
List of column names for composite unique constraints.
Only used when applied to a class.

name: name
desc: Optional name for the unique constraint.

name: UpdatedAt
desc: Indicates that a field should automatically store the last update timestamp.

name: AttributeConverter
desc: Base class for custom type converters.

name: convertToDatabaseColumn
desc: Converts the value from the Dart type T to the database type S.

name: convertToEntityAttribute
desc: Converts the value from the database type S to the Dart type T.

name: DatabaseConnection
desc: Interface for database connections provided by plugins.

name: beginTransaction
desc: Starts a new transaction manually.

name: close
desc: Closes the underlying connection or pool.

name: execute
desc: Executes a raw SQL query and returns the results as a QueryResult.

name: schemaManager
desc: Provides access to SchemaManager for DDL operations and migrations.

name: stream
desc: Executes a raw SQL query and returns a stream of rows.

name: DatapodDatabase
desc: Represents a database connection instance and provides access to its features.

name: close
desc: Closes the database connection and releases any pooled resources.

name: connection
desc: The underlying connection provided by the plugin.

name: migrationConnection
desc: An optional connection with elevated privileges for migrations.

name: name
desc: The name of this database as defined in databases.yaml.

name: schemaManager
desc: The schema manager for this database.

name: transactionManager
desc: The TransactionManager for this database.

name: datapod_api
desc: Core API definitions for Datapod ORM.

name: ManagedEntity
desc: Interface for entities that are managed by the Datapod ORM.

name: $database
desc: The database instance that manages this entity.

name: $id
desc: The value of the primary key field for this entity.

name: $relationshipContext
desc: The relationship context used for orchestrating associations.

name: clearDirty
desc: Resets the dirty state of the entity.

name: isDirty
desc: Whether the entity has unsaved changes.

name: isManaged
desc: Whether the entity is currently managed by the ORM.

name: isPersistent
desc: Whether the entity represents a persistent record in the database.

name: markDirty
desc: Marks the entity as having unsaved changes.

name: markPersistent
desc: Marks the entity as managed and persistent (e.g., after a successful insert).

name: ConfigurationException
desc: Thrown when configuration is invalid.

name: ConnectionException
desc: Thrown when a database connection fails.

name: DatapodException
desc: Base class for all Datapod exceptions.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: QueryException
desc: Thrown when a query execution fails.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TransactionException
desc: Thrown when a transaction operation fails.

name: EntityMapper
desc: Interface for mapping database rows to entities.

name: mapRow
desc: Maps a single database row to an entity.

name: mapRows
desc: Maps a list of database rows to a list of entities.

name: DatabaseOperations
desc: Interface for executing database operations for a specific entity.

name: delete
desc: Deletes an entity by its primary key.

name: findAll
desc: Finds all entities.

name: findById
desc: Finds an entity by its primary key.

name: save
desc: Saves an entity (insert or update).

name: saveEntity
desc: Saves an entity (insert or update), handling conversion to/from managed state.

name: Direction
desc: Sorting direction.

name: isAscending
desc: Returns whether this direction is ascending.

name: isDescending
desc: Returns whether this direction is descending.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Page
desc: A page of data.

name: hasNext
desc: Whether there are more pages.

name: hasPrevious
desc: Whether there are previous pages.

name: items
desc: The items in this page.

name: pageNumber
desc: The current page number.

name: pageSize
desc: The size of each page.

name: totalElements
desc: The total number of items across all pages.

name: totalPages
desc: The total number of pages.

name: Pageable
desc: Pagination information.

name: offset
desc: The offset for the database query.

name: page
desc: The page number (0-indexed).

name: size
desc: The size of the page.

name: sort
desc: Optional sorting.

name: withPage
desc: Creates a new Pageable with the given page number.

name: Sort
desc: Defines sorting for a single field.

name: Sort.asc
desc: Creates an ascending sort.

name: Sort.desc
desc: Creates a descending sort.

name: direction
desc: The direction to sort.

name: field
desc: The field to sort by.

name: applyPagination
desc: Helper to apply sorting and pagination to a SQL query at runtime.

name: QueryResult
desc: Represents the result of a database query.

name: affectedRows
desc: The number of rows affected by the query (for INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE).

name: lastInsertId
desc: The last inserted ID (if applicable).

name: rows
desc:
The rows returned by the query.
Each row is a map of column names to values.

name: RelationshipContext
desc: Context for managing relationships between repositories.

name: getMapper
desc: Gets the mapper for an entity type.

name: getOperations
desc: Gets the operations for an entity type.

name: registerMapper
desc: Registers a mapper for an entity type.

name: registerOperations
desc: Registers operations for an entity type.

name: RelationshipContextImpl
desc: A simple implementation of RelationshipContext.

name: getMapper
desc: Gets the mapper for an entity type.

name: getOperations
desc: Gets the operations for an entity type.

name: registerMapper
desc: Registers a mapper for an entity type.

name: registerOperations
desc: Registers operations for an entity type.

name: BaseRepository
desc: Base repository interface for entity operations.

name: delete
desc: Deletes the entity with the given id from the database.

name: findAll
desc: Finds all entities.

name: findAllPaged
desc: Finds a page of entities.

name: findById
desc: Finds an entity by its primary key id.

name: relationshipContext
desc: The context used for relationship orchestration and database access.

name: save
desc: Saves the given entity to the database.

name: saveAll
desc: Saves all given entities to the database in a batch or sequential order.

name: RepositoryRegistry
desc: A central registry for managing and looking up repository instances.

name: clear
desc: Clears all registered repositories.

name: get
desc: Gets a repository of type R.

name: getForEntity
desc: Gets the repository that manages entities of type E.

name: register
desc: Registers a repository of type R.

name: registerForEntity
desc: Registers a repository as the default for entity type E.

name: ColumnDefinition
desc: Represents the desired state of a database column.

name: ColumnMetadata
desc: Metadata about a database column (current state).

name: ForeignKeyDefinition
desc: Represents a foreign key constraint.

name: IndexDefinition
desc: Represents an index definition.

name: SchemaDefinition
desc: Represents the desired state of the database schema.

name: SchemaManager
desc: Interface for schema management and migrations.

name: generateSchemaScript
desc: Generates the SQL script to initialize the schema without executing it.

name: getTables
desc: Inspects the current database schema.

name: initializeSchema
desc: Initializes the schema based on entity definitions.

name: migrateSchema
desc: Migrates the schema to the latest version.

name: setSchema
desc: Sets the desired schema for the database.

name: TableDefinition
desc: Represents the desired state of a database table.

name: TableMetadata
desc: Metadata about a database table (current state).

name: UniqueConstraintDefinition
desc: Represents a unique constraint definition.

name: Transaction
desc: A handle for manual database transaction control.

name: commit
desc: Commits all changes made within this transaction to the database.

name: createSavepoint
desc: Creates a named savepoint within the transaction.

name: releaseSavepoint
desc:
Releases a savepoint, making its changes permanent relative to the
parent transaction.

name: rollback
desc: Rolls back all changes made within this transaction.

name: rollbackToSavepoint
desc: Rolls back all changes made after the specified savepoint was created.

name: TransactionManager
desc: Manages database transactions and provides nested transaction support.

name: beginTransaction
desc: Starts a new transaction manually.

name: runInTransaction
desc: Runs the given action within a transaction.
